text: Sabas, ang barbaro () is a 1952 Philippine drama film directed by Enrique Moreno and written by Francisco Coching. It is based on Coching's eponymous comics series. ==Cast== *Tita Duran *Pancho Magalona *Tessie Martinez ==External links== * Category:1952 films Category:1952 drama films Category:Philippine films Category:Tagalog-language films Category:Filipino- language films Category:Films set in the 19th century Category:Films based on Philippine comics Category:Films directed by Eddie Romero
title: Sabas, ang barbaro
